content: tail lightly or not at all* r31 6dec 6 fasten_off leave a medium tail & sew closed go back to ~r25 flaten across so your tail is like a pancake parallel to the nose weave excess yarn from r31 up to here and use to secure the tail shape flat fins make 2 r1 6sc into magic_ring 6 r2 increase single_crochet x 3 9 r3 2sc increase x 3 12 r4-5 12 single_crochet around 12 fasten_off do not stuff flaten and sew across seam to close finishing  sew fins onto your new friend in whatever posi�on you d like mine are sewn between ~r7 and r12  embroider 2 small black lines or circles for nostrils  weave in loose ends thank you i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you post your murphy on social media please tag @buzzyhoneycra�s so i can see your crea�on s�arcyenohyzzub@ s�arcyenohyzzub@
